remarks: Inner product with a zero first argument.  Part of proof of Theorem 6.44 of [Ponnusamy] p. 361.  Complex version of ~ ip0l .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphip0l.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
cphip0l $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( .0. ., A ) = 0 ) $.
